meaningMnemonic: There are <radical>stone</radical>s that smell like <radical>trash</radical> in the <radical>river</radical>. You reach in and realize these rocks are made of <kanji>sulfur</kanji>. Even the flow of this water can't hide the stink of these sulfur rocks.
readingMnemonic: You throw the <kanji>sulfur</kanji> rock as hard as you can, but it hits someone in the back of the head. Oh no, it's <reading>Ryu</reading> (りゅう) from Street Fighter. You try to apologize and explain that you just didn't want this stinky trash rock, I mean, sulfur rock near you. You didn't know he was there.
